title: EmotionSense Pro
author: Agshin Rajabov
excerpt: EmotionSense Pro is a Chrome extension that detects real-time emotions in Google Meet using AI—without sending data to servers. Ideal for UX researchers, recruiters, and educators seeking ethical, local emotion analytics.
text: EmotionSense Pro is a Chrome extension that detects real-time emotions in Google Meet using AI—without sending data to servers. Ideal for UX researchers, recruiters, and educators seeking ethical, local emotion analytics.
html: EmotionSense Pro is a Chrome extension that detects real-time emotions in Google Meet using AI—without sending data to servers. Ideal for UX researchers, recruiters, and educators seeking ethical, local emotion analytics.
